languages.text: {n}Глаза Теодоры глядят не мигая — словно змеиные очи. Под ее взглядом вы почти не чувствуете, как пламя опаляет вашу кожу, оставляя ожоги.{/n} "Я могу вывести тебя из этого огня, {name}. Указать дорогу. Избавить от боли. И дать оружие для войны с твоими врагами. Решай".

{n}Theodora watches you without blinking. Her snake-like gaze almost makes you forget about the fire searing you, leaving burns on your skin.{/n} "I can lead you out of these flames, {name}. Show you a path. Rid you of pain. And give you a weapon so that you may defeat your enemies. Decide."
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза Теодоры глядят не мигая — словно змеиные очи. Под ее взглядом вы почти не чувствуете, как пламя опаляет вашу кожу, оставляя ожоги.{/n} "Я могу вывести тебя из этого огня, {name}. Указать дорогу. Избавить от боли. И дать оружие для войны с твоими врагами. Решай".

traits.locale_text: {n}Theodora is watching you without blinking. Her snake-like gaze almost makes you forget about the fire searing you, leaving burns on the skin.{/n} "I can lead you out of these flames, {name}. Show you a path. Rid you of pain. And give you a weapon so that you may defeat your enemies. Decide."

{n}Theodora watches you without blinking. Her snake-like gaze almost makes you forget about the fire searing you, leaving burns on your skin.{/n} "I can lead you out of these flames, {name}. Show you a path. Rid you of pain. And give you a weapon so that you may defeat your enemies. Decide."

languages.text: {n}西奥多拉的眼睛一眨不眨地看着你。她的目光像蛇一般，让你几乎忘记你正在遭受火焰的灼烧，也忘记了皮肤火辣辣的疼痛。{/n}“我可以指引你走出这片火焰，{name}。我可以为你指明前路，消除你的痛苦，并赐予你一件武器，让你打败你的敌人。做出选择吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora watches you without blinking. Her snake-like gaze almost makes you forget about the fire searing you, leaving burns on your skin.{/n} "I can lead you out of these flames, {name}. Show you a path. Rid you of pain. And give you a weapon so that you may defeat your enemies. Decide."

traits.locale_text: {n}西奥多拉的眼睛一眨不眨地看着你。她的目光像蛇一般，让你几乎忘记你正在遭受火焰的灼烧，也忘记了皮肤火辣辣的疼痛。{/n}“我可以指引你走出这片火焰，{name}。我可以为你指明前路，消除你的痛苦，并赐予你一件武器，让你打败你的敌人。做出选择吧。”

languages.text: {n}Theodora te mira sin pestañear. Su mirada serpentina casi hace que olvides el fuego que te abrasa, marcando tu piel.{/n} «Puedo sacarte de las llamas, {name}. Mostrarte un camino. Librarte del dolor. Y darte un arma con la que derrotar a tus enemigos. Decide».
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora watches you without blinking. Her snake-like gaze almost makes you forget about the fire searing you, leaving burns on your skin.{/n} "I can lead you out of these flames, {name}. Show you a path. Rid you of pain. And give you a weapon so that you may defeat your enemies. Decide."

traits.locale_text: {n}Theodora te mira sin pestañear. Su mirada serpentina casi hace que olvides el fuego que te abrasa, marcando tu piel.{/n} «Puedo sacarte de las llamas, {name}. Mostrarte un camino. Librarte del dolor. Y darte un arma con la que derrotar a tus enemigos. Decide».

languages.text: {n}シオドーラは瞬きもせずにあなたを見つめている。彼女の蛇のような視線は、あなたを焼き、皮膚に火傷を残す火のことを忘れさせるほどだ。{/n}「私はあなたをこの炎から導き出すことができます、{name}。あなたに道を示します。あなたを苦痛から解放します。そしてあなたが敵を倒すことができるように武器を与えます。決断しなさい」
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora watches you without blinking. Her snake-like gaze almost makes you forget about the fire searing you, leaving burns on your skin.{/n} "I can lead you out of these flames, {name}. Show you a path. Rid you of pain. And give you a weapon so that you may defeat your enemies. Decide."

traits.locale_text: {n}テオドラは瞬きもせずにあなたを見つめています。彼女の蛇のような視線は、あなたを焼き、皮膚に火傷を残す火のことを忘れさせるほどです。{/n}「私はあなたをこの炎から導き出すことができます、{name}。あなたに道を示します。あなたを苦痛から解放します。そしてあなたが敵を倒すことができるように武器を与えます。決断しなさい」
{n}シオドーラは瞬きもせずにあなたを見つめている。彼女の蛇のような視線は、あなたを焼き、皮膚に火傷を残す火のことを忘れさせるほどだ。{/n}「私はあなたをこの炎から導き出すことができます、{name}。あなたに道を示します。あなたを苦痛から解放します。そしてあなたが敵を倒すことができるように武器を与えます。決断しなさい」

languages.text: {n}Théodora vous observe sans sourciller. Son regard de serpent vous fait presque oublier la chaleur qui vous étouffe et vous brûle la peau.{/n} « Je peux vous mener hors des flammes, {name}. Vous montrer la voie, vous débarrasser de la douleur et vous fournir une arme capable de terrasser vos ennemis. À vous de décider. »
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora watches you without blinking. Her snake-like gaze almost makes you forget about the fire searing you, leaving burns on your skin.{/n} "I can lead you out of these flames, {name}. Show you a path. Rid you of pain. And give you a weapon so that you may defeat your enemies. Decide."

traits.locale_text: {n}Théodora vous observe sans sourciller. Son regard de serpent vous fait presque oublier la chaleur qui vous étouffe et vous brûle la peau.{/n} « Je peux vous mener hors des flammes, {name}. Vous montrer la voie, vous débarrasser de la douleur et vous fournir une arme capable de terrasser vos ennemis. À vous de décider. »

languages.text: {n}Theodora betrachtet dich, ohne zu blinzeln. Ihr schlangenähnlicher Blick lässt dich das Feuer vergessen, das dich verzehrt und Verbrennungen auf deiner Haut hinterlässt.{/n} "Ich kann Euch aus diesen Flammen führen, {name}. Euch einen Weg zeigen. Euch von Schmerzen befreien. Und Euch eine Waffe geben, damit Ihr Eure Feinde besiegen könnt. Entscheidet Euch."
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora watches you without blinking. Her snake-like gaze almost makes you forget about the fire searing you, leaving burns on your skin.{/n} "I can lead you out of these flames, {name}. Show you a path. Rid you of pain. And give you a weapon so that you may defeat your enemies. Decide."

traits.locale_text: {n}Theodora betrachtet dich, ohne zu blinzeln. Ihr schlangenähnlicher Blick lässt dich das Feuer vergessen, das dich verzehrt und Verbrennungen auf deiner Haut hinterlässt.{/n} "Ich kann Euch aus diesen Flammen führen, {name}. Euch einen Weg zeigen. Euch von Schmerzen befreien. Und Euch eine Waffe geben, damit Ihr Eure Feinde besiegen könnt. Entscheidet Euch."

languages.text: {n}Theodora, gözlerini kırpmadan seni izliyor. Yılanvari bakışları, vücudunu alazlayıp yanık izleri bırakan alevleri neredeyse unutmana sebep oluyor.{/n} "Seni bu alevlerden çıkarabilirim {name}. Bir yol gösterebilir, acından arındırabilir ve düşmanlarını mağlup etmeni sağlayacak bir silah verebilirim. Seçim senin."
languages.original_text: {n}Theodora watches you without blinking. Her snake-like gaze almost makes you forget about the fire searing you, leaving burns on your skin.{/n} "I can lead you out of these flames, {name}. Show you a path. Rid you of pain. And give you a weapon so that you may defeat your enemies. Decide."
